@_Wilx_ @SpitfireAudio Fair play man! I have the woodwinds and chamber strings. Always tempted by every new release but January is tight!

Played my first NYE gig last night in 6 years. It got a bit out of hand! Stage covered in glass!

Beautiful sunny morning in London Town. Quick coffee then I've an action cue to work on!
Watching Beethoven the movie with @Tadhg_er and @HanGraceMusic. Classic Sunday film
'Donald Trump looks like someone playing the president in a porno' - Frankie Boyle
Lovely mild autumn day in London. Bit of @Headspace in the local park :)

What a beautiful autumn day in London. Happy Halloween folks!
Back Pocket by Vulfpeck is vastly improving my day as are Vulfpeck in general. So tasty! #vulfpeck

In lovely Manchester. Probably my favourite gig city in the UK. Show tonight in the Gorilla with @gabriellaacohen :)

Ears all clear and hearing is good! Thank fook! :)
At Harley Street hearing to get my ears tested thanks to @HelpMusiciansUK. Look after your hearing folks, don't take it for granted!
@lestersalmins happy birthday broseph! :)
Mental health is at the centre of all health. Be there for people and always listen attentively not listen to reply. #WorldMentalHealthDay
Monday's are starting to be my favourite day of the week! #TELLMEWHYIquitelikemondays
